header.title: wxCheckBox

description.p: A checkbox is a labelled box which by default is either on (checkmark is visible) or off (no checkmark). Optionally (when the wxCHK_3STATE style flag is set) it can have a third state, called the mixed or undetermined state. Often this is used as a "Does Not Apply" state.
